Name: Favonius Cathedral
Title: Gathering of the Devout
Desc: "If you speak sincerely into the wind, your words will surely reach the archon's ear one day."

Talent.Name: Favonius Cathedral
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heals your active character for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
